scenes.description: Kureiji Ollie and Anya Melfissa perform the song 'Patchwork Staccato' on a 3D stage filled with swords and weapons.
scenes.song_name: ツギハギスタッカート (Patchwork Staccato)

scenes.description: MC segment where Ollie and Anya discuss their performance, their duo name 'Anomaly', and the dangerous stage design.

subtitles.original: さあ、終わりにしよう
subtitles.english: Now, let's end this.

subtitles.original: この糸　ちぎるの色とりどり
subtitles.english: Tearing these threads, in various colors...

subtitles.original: 散らばるでしょ
subtitles.english: They'll scatter, won't they?

subtitles.original: ねえ　ほら　あの時の言葉
subtitles.english: Hey, look, the words from back then...

subtitles.original: 重ねた　無駄な時間
subtitles.english: And the useless time we spent together.

subtitles.original: この糸　ちぎるだけ
subtitles.english: Just tearing this thread...

subtitles.original: 不相応だね　笑えるでしょ
subtitles.english: It's unsuitable, laughable, isn't it?

subtitles.original: チクタク　チクタク
subtitles.english: Tick-tack, tick-tack

subtitles.original: 円を描いて
subtitles.english: Drawing a circle.

subtitles.original: ディンドン　ディンドン
subtitles.english: Ding-dong, ding-dong

subtitles.original: 遊びましょう
subtitles.english: Let's play.

subtitles.original: チクタク　チクタク
subtitles.english: Tick-tack, tick-tack

subtitles.original: 結んで開いて
subtitles.english: Tying and opening.

subtitles.original: ディンドン　ディンドン
subtitles.english: Ding-dong, ding-dong

subtitles.original: じゃあまたね
subtitles.english: See you later.

subtitles.original: ほつれた糸がささやく
subtitles.english: The frayed thread whispers.

subtitles.original: 君よ　いっそ　いっそ　いなくなれ
subtitles.english: I wish you'd just, just disappear.

subtitles.original: 変わらないこと　回ってるだけ
subtitles.english: Things don't change, they're just spinning.

subtitles.original: きっと　きっと　なんてことない
subtitles.english: Surely, surely it's no big deal.

subtitles.original: 少し　軽くなるだけ
subtitles.english: It'll just get a little lighter.

subtitles.original: ねえ　いっそ　いっそ　捨てちゃえば
subtitles.english: Hey, if I just, just throw it away...

subtitles.original: 気づかないまま　いられたらだけど
subtitles.english: If only I could have remained unaware.

subtitles.original: ずっと　ずっと　好きかもな
subtitles.english: I might love you forever and ever.

subtitles.original: 少しだけ　痛いかな
subtitles.english: It might hurt just a little.

subtitles.original: 気づけば　気にしてる画面を
subtitles.english: Before I know it, I'm checking the screen.

subtitles.original: そろそろ　見飽きた
subtitles.english: I'm getting tired of looking at it.

subtitles.original: アレ　抜き　コレ　抜き
subtitles.english: Without this, without that.

subtitles.original: それじゃつまんないんでしょ　退屈でしょ
subtitles.english: That's boring, isn't it? Tedious, right?

subtitles.original: フリック　フリック
subtitles.english: Flick, flick

subtitles.original: 指を滑って
subtitles.english: Sliding my finger.

subtitles.original: スワイプ　スワイプ
subtitles.english: Swipe, swipe

subtitles.original: 遠ざけて
subtitles.english: Pushing it away.

subtitles.original: フリック　フリック
subtitles.english: Flick, flick

subtitles.original: 開いて　閉じて
subtitles.english: Opening and closing.

subtitles.original: スワイプ　スワイプ
subtitles.english: Swipe, swipe

subtitles.original: もう嫌だな
subtitles.english: I've had enough.

subtitles.original: スルスル糸がささやく
subtitles.english: The sliding thread whispers.

subtitles.original: 君よ　いっそ　いっそ　いなくなれ
subtitles.english: I wish you'd just, just disappear.

subtitles.original: 変わらないこのまま　だよ　だから
subtitles.english: It's the same as always, that's why...

subtitles.original: きっと　きっと　なんてことない
subtitles.english: Surely, surely it's no big deal.

subtitles.original: 少し　寂しくなるだけ
subtitles.english: It'll just get a little lonely.

subtitles.original: ねえ　いっそ　いっそ　捨てちゃおう
subtitles.english: Hey, let's just, just throw it away.

subtitles.original: 気づかないまま　過ごした分だけ
subtitles.english: For all the time I spent unaware.

subtitles.original: ずっと　ずっと　好きだけど
subtitles.english: I'll love you forever and ever, but...

subtitles.original: 少しだけ　痛いけど
subtitles.english: It hurts just a little, though.

subtitles.original: だから
subtitles.english: That's why...

subtitles.original: だから　いっそ　いっそ　いなくなれ
subtitles.english: That's why I wish you'd just, just disappear.

subtitles.original: 変わらないこと　回ってるだけ
subtitles.english: Things don't change, they're just spinning.

subtitles.original: きっと　きっと　なんてことない
subtitles.english: Surely, surely it's no big deal.

subtitles.original: 少し　寂しくなるけど
subtitles.english: It'll get a little lonely, though.

subtitles.original: ねえ　いっそ　いっそ　捨てちゃうよ
subtitles.english: Hey, I'm just, just going to throw it away.

subtitles.original: 気づかないまま　気づかないなら
subtitles.english: Remaining unaware, if you won't notice...

subtitles.original: ずっと　ずっと　好きなのは
subtitles.english: The one who will love you forever and ever...

subtitles.original: 最初から　僕だけ
subtitles.english: From the start, was just me.

subtitles.original: チクタク　チクタク
subtitles.english: Tick-tack, tick-tack

subtitles.original: ディンドン　ディンドン
subtitles.english: Ding-dong, ding-dong

subtitles.original: ツギハギだらけの　君との時間を
subtitles.english: This time with you, full of patches...

subtitles.original: そろそろ　終わりにしよう
subtitles.english: It's about time to end this.

subtitles.original: この糸　ちぎるだけ　簡単でしょ
subtitles.english: Just tearing this thread, it's easy, right?

subtitles.original: 笑えるよね
subtitles.english: It's laughable, isn't it?

subtitles.original: （歓声）
subtitles.english: (Cheering)

subtitles.original: Wah, keren banget enggak sih kita tadi? Kita nyanyiin apa tadi?
subtitles.english: Wow, weren't we so cool just now? What did we sing?

subtitles.original: Tsugihagi Staccato!
subtitles.english: Patchwork Staccato!

subtitles.original: （歓声）
subtitles.english: (Cheering)

subtitles.original: Wah keren keren keren.
subtitles.english: Wow, cool cool cool.

subtitles.original: Keren, bagaimana menurutmu?
subtitles.english: Cool, what do you think?

subtitles.original: Ya pokoknya, pokoknya lagunya kayaknya ini ya, kombi kita punya potensi ya.
subtitles.english: Well anyway, anyway, the song seems to show that our duo has potential, right?

subtitles.original: Anomaly?
subtitles.english: Anomaly?

subtitles.original: Anomaly. Yeah, that's our name.
subtitles.english: Anomaly. Yeah, that's our name.

subtitles.original: That's our name!
subtitles.english: That's our name!

subtitles.original: Kita entah kenapa jarang kumpul ya guys dua ini.
subtitles.english: For some reason, these two rarely hang out together, guys.

subtitles.original: Kapan lagi kita nyanyi di stage bareng kayak gini dan dance di stage bareng kayak gini, iya enggak sih?
subtitles.english: When else will we sing on stage together like this and dance on stage together like this, right?

subtitles.original: Stagenya ini keren lho, by the way.
subtitles.english: This stage is cool, by the way.

subtitles.original: Wah stagenya, ya ini stage-ku. Hehehe. Sisisisi.
subtitles.english: Wow, the stage, yeah this is my stage. Hehehe. Sisisisi.

subtitles.original: Hati-hati ya, di bawah banyak senjata. Ada pistol di situ, serem sih.
subtitles.english: Be careful, there are many weapons below. There's a pistol there, it's scary.

subtitles.original: Tadi enggak ketusuk kan? Ada pedang, ada pistol dan lain-lain.
subtitles.english: You didn't get poked earlier, right? There were swords, pistols, and so on.

subtitles.original: Untungnya kaki masih aman.
subtitles.english: Luckily my legs are still safe.

subtitles.original: Kaki masih aman, enggak putus?
subtitles.english: Legs are still safe, not severed?

subtitles.original: Enggak putus.
subtitles.english: Not severed.

subtitles.original: Enggak putus. Oke, takut... takutnya aku itu doang sih, guys.
subtitles.english: Not severed. Okay, I was just... just afraid of that, guys.
